Description:
Monogatari Series Off & Monster Season (〈物語〉シリーズ オフ&モンスターシーズン) is the 12th anime adaptation from Studio Shaft of the Monogatari Series light novels. It is said to adapt all works from Off Season and Monster Season, the 4th and 5th seasons of the series respectively. 
It is the first adaptation to be directed by Midori Yoshizawa, who has done Episode Direction and Storyboarding for Owarimonogatari and Zoku Owarimonogatari previously. 
The series is set to premiere July 6th, 2024.
